question_text: Which of the following are valid security measures for managing printer sharing and print servers? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Assigning permissions by user or group
Requiring print jobs to be approved before printing
Restricting management access to admin users only
correct_answer: Assigning permissions by user or group
Restricting management access to admin users only
explanation: Access control, admin-only configuration, and audit logging are key to securely managing printer sharing and print servers. Disabling logging would reduce visibility, not increase security.
